# platform Provider

npa_policy: NPA policy CRUD operations.

## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    Platform = {
      source  = "API-Dev-NS/Platform"
      version = "0.10.0"
    }
  }
}

provider "Platform" {
  # Configuration options
}
```
